Fleet of Foot.summary: Unit may run and then assault in the same turn.

Independent Character.summary: May join/leave units. Look Out Sir rolls.

Fearless.summary: Passes Morale/Pinning automatically. Cannot go to Ground.

Move Through Cover.summary: Roll 3D6 for cover movement, pick highest. Not slowed by difficult terrain when assaulting.

Infiltrate.summary: May deploy anywhere not within 12" of enemy (or 18" if in sight).

Scouts.summary: May Outflank. After deployment, may make a free move.

Masters of Stealth.summary: Unit has Infiltrate, Stealth, and Move Through Cover.

Pathfinders.summary: Unit has Scouts. Cover saves are improved by +2 (instead of +1 from Stealth). Ignore difficult terrain.

Skilled Rider.summary: Reroll dangerous terrain tests. +1 to Jink cover saves.

Tank Hunters.summary: Reroll failed armour penetration rolls against vehicles. +1 to damage chart.

Crack Shot.summary: Shooting ignores cover saves. Reroll failed To Wound rolls.

Fast Shot.summary: +1 shot with weapon (e.g. Heavy 2 becomes Heavy 3).

Bladestorm.summary: Shoot one extra shot per model. Unit cannot fire next turn.

Defend.summary: Enemies attacking this unit in melee reduce Attacks by 1 (min 1).

War Shout.summary: First round of assault: enemies must pass Morale or fight at WS1.

Skyleap.summary: Movement phase: Remove from table. Deep Strike back next turn.

Intercept.summary: In assault, hit vehicles on 4+ regardless of speed.

Hit and Run.summary: End of assault phase: roll Initiative to break from combat and move 3D6".

Feel No Pain.summary: Ignore unsaved wounds on 4+ (unless Instant Death/AP1/AP2).

Doomed.summary: Suffer 1 automatic wound at end of game.

Molten Body.summary: Immune to Melta and Flamer weapons.

Wraithsight.summary: Start of turn: if not within 6" of Psyker, roll D6. On 1, unit does nothing.

Psychic Powers.summary: Psyker may use one power per turn. Takes a Psychic Test (Ld check).

Doom.summary: Range 24". Target enemy unit re-rolls failed To Wound rolls.

Guide.summary: Range 6". Target friendly unit re-rolls failed To Hit rolls.

Fortune.summary: Range 6". Target friendly unit re-rolls failed Saves.

Eldritch Storm.summary: Range 18". Large Blast, S3 AP-. Pinning. Vehicles are spun facing.

Mind War.summary: Range 18". Target model. Roll D6+Ld vs D6+Ld. Difference = Wounds (no armor/cover saves).

Conceal.summary: Warlock and unit have 5+ Cover Save.

Embolden.summary: Warlock and unit re-roll failed Morale/Pinning tests.

Enhance.summary: Warlock and unit have +1 WS and +1 I.

Divination.summary: Redeploy D3+1 units after deployment (within deployment zone).

Deep Strike.summary: May deploy via Deep Strike rules.

Warlock Powers.summary: Has access to Destructor, Conceal, Embolden, Enhance.

Surprise Assault.summary: Exarch power: When Deep Striking, unit may fire one extra time.

Withdraw.summary: Exarch power: Unit gains Hit & Run.

Monstrous Creature.summary: 2D6 Armor Pen, Move Through Cover, Relentless, Fear, Smash.

Warlock (Jetbike).summary: Character upgrade. Warlock mounted on an Eldar Jetbike.

Shimmershield.summary: 5+ Invulnerable save for the Exarch and his unit in close combat.

Diresword.summary: Power Weapon. Targets suffering a wound must pass a Ld test or suffer Instant Death.

Executioner.summary: Two-handed Power Weapon that grants +2 Strength.

Mirrorswords.summary: Paired Power Weapons. Grants +2 Attacks instead of the usual +1 for two weapons.

Triskele.summary: Power Weapon. Can be thrown: Range 12", S3, AP2, Assault 3.

Scorpion's Claw.summary: Counts as a Power Fist (S x2, AP2, Unwieldy) and a Shuriken Catapult.

Biting Blade.summary: Two-handed. Grants +1 Strength. Each hit adds a further +1 Strength for wounding.

Chainsabres.summary: Counts as Twin-linked Shuriken Pistols. In melee, grants +1 Attack and re-rolls to Hit and Wound.

Powerblades.summary: Count as Power Weapons. Grant +1 Attack.

Ghosthelm.summary: Ignore Perils of the Warp on a 3+ (take an invulnerable save).

Spirit Stones.summary: Psyker: Use a second power per turn. Vehicle: Ignore 'Crew Stunned' on 2+.

Runes of Warding.summary: Enemy psykers roll 3D6 for psychic tests.

Runes of Witnessing.summary: Psyker rolls 3D6 for psychic tests and discards the highest die.

Banshee Mask.summary: Negates Initiative bonus from cover. In first round of combat, unit attacks at I10.

Mandiblasters.summary: Start of each assault phase: roll D6. On 4+, enemy takes S3 hit.

Plasma Grenades.summary: Assault grenades. No Initiative penalty when charging through cover.

Swooping Hawk Wings.summary: Move as Jump Infantry. Can Deep Strike.

Grenade Pack.summary: Can drop Large Blast S4 AP5 when Deep Striking. Can drop Blast S4 AP5 when moving over unit.

Warp Jump Generator.summary: Move 12" ignoring terrain. Can make a second 2D6" jump in Assault phase.

Holo-fields.summary: Roll 2D6 for armor penetration against this vehicle and pick the lowest.

Star Engines.summary: Move extra 12" in Shooting phase (cannot shoot).

Vectored Engines.summary: If Immobilised while moving Fast, treat as landed instead of destroyed.

The Eye of Wrath.summary: Once per game, place Large Blast over Yriel. S6 AP3. Hits all units (friend or foe).

The Spear of Twilight.summary: S9 vs Vehicles (Thrown). Counts as Power Weapon that wounds on 2+ in melee.

Sword of Asur.summary: Power Weapon. Reroll failed To Hit. Wounds with a 5+ (on the dice) cause Instant Death.

The Silent Death.summary: S4 AP2 Assault 3. Thrown weapon (Range 12"). Returns to thrower.

The Fire Axe.summary: Counts as a Power Fist (S+2) but strikes at normal Initiative (not I1). No two-handed bonus.

Troupe Master.summary: Upgrade Character. +1 WS, +1 W, +1 A, +1 Ld. Equipped with Power Weapon and Fusion Pistol options.

Shadowseer.summary: Upgrade Character. Psyker. +1 Ld. Has Hallucinogen Grenades. Power: Veil of Tears (2D6x2 spotting distance).

Death Jester.summary: Upgrade Character. Equipped with Shrieker Cannon.

Hallucinogen Grenades.summary: Counts as Assault Grenades. Enemies in cover check Ld; failure = stun/attack own unit.

Staff of Ulthamar.summary: Force Weapon. Allows Spirit Stones to be used on a 2+.

Energy Field.summary: Penetrating hits with S > 8 count as S8. Ranged attacks against Front/Side never roll > 1D6 for penetration.

Melta bombs.summary: S8 AP1 against vehicles in assault. Unwieldy.

Eldar jetbike.summary: Unit type becomes Jetbike. +1 Toughness, 3+ Save, Turbo-boost move.

Warlock Leader.summary: One model becomes a Warlock Leader (Character).

Spiritseer Leader.summary: One model becomes a Spiritseer Leader (Character).

Eldar missile launcher.notes: Krak (S8 AP3) or Plasma (S4 AP4 Blast Pinning)

Prism Cannon.notes: Focused (S9 AP2 Blast) or Dispersed (S5 AP4 Lg Blast)

Ranger long rifle.notes: Sniper, Pinning. Rending on 6 (or 5+ if Pathfinder).
